description:
Mutsumi tells his brother Kazuma, "Serinuma-san is my girlfriend." However, Kazuma keeps on pursuing Kae, now with even more gusto. Igarashi, Nanashima, Shinomiya and Nishina all try to band together to get in Kazuma`s way, but Kazuma has a way of making sport of their efforts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A l`attaque ! Duel au jeu de cartes "châteaux" !
いざ出陣!! 城ガード!
